title: Travellama
description: An iOS travel-planning app powered by Google Places API and a custom route-optimization engine. Users select a destination, choose restaurants and attractions, set trip length, and instantly receive an auto-generated, fully optimized itinerary. The algorithm minimizes travel time, schedules meals at preferred locations, and balances daily activities using real-time distance and duration calculations. A dynamic calendar UI lets users drag-adjust timeslots, triggering rapid re-optimization for a fully personalized trip plan.

title: Real-time Chat Platform
description: Modern messaging platform with end-to-end encryption, file sharing, and real-time collaboration features.

title: E-commerce Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for online stores with advanced data visualization and predictive insights.

title: Mobile Fitness Tracker
description: Cross-platform mobile app for tracking workouts, nutrition, and health metrics with social features.

title: Blockchain Voting System
description: Secure and transparent voting platform built on blockchain technology with smart contract integration.

title: Weather Prediction API
description: Advanced weather forecasting service using multiple data sources and machine learning for accurate predictions.
